Welcome.firstPage: Welcome to the school app Elektronik. Your school information center always at hand!
Welcome.secondPage: Electron++ is a student app that helps students with features like lesson schedule, substitute information.

setUp.name: Enter Name
setUp.timetableError: An error occurred. Unable to download the class roster. Try again later.
setUp.informationWhy: Fill out this form to receive notifications, lesson schedule, and substitutes for your class
setUp.privacyDisclaimer: Your settings are not sent anywhere

notifications.notReadyYet: Notifications are <highlight>not ready yet</highlight>, but we are working on it!
notifications.heading: Notifications
notifications.nSchoolSub: Notifications about new school management announcements
notifications.nCouncilSub: Notifications about new student council announcements

theme.heading: Themes
theme.lightDisclaimer: If the light theme doesn't work, go to <redirect>phone settings</redirect> and turn off <italic>Automatic Adjustment</italic>

Substitutions.heading: Substitutions
Substitutions.error: An unexpected error occurred, check your internet connection. If the problem persists, try again later.

error.setDefaultGroup: An error occurred and the group could not be set automatically. Click the button below to set it manually, or restart the application
error.changeGroup: An error occurred and the group could not be changed. Restart the applications and try again.
error.changeReligion: An error occurred and the religion display could not be changed. Restart the applications and try again.

bottomSheet.data: An error occurred while fetching data. Check your internet access and try again

LuckyNumber.title: Lucky number:
LuckyNumber.match: You have a lucky number today!

Error.noData: Failed to load data. Check if you have the internet on
